room_title: Escape room "Fallout" by Locked Up Bloomington in Bloomington (IN)
room_description:
It is present day and you are a CIA field Operative working directly for the President of the United States. While going over your mission notes you discover that the North Korean government has attempted to cover up a disastrous nuclear weapons test, one that was reportedly four times worse than Chernobyl, that occurred in the 1980s.
The Supreme Leader of North Korea Kim Jong-Un has strategically placed several nuclear ballistic missiles that are capable of reaching major U.S. cities with only a 4-minute flight time. You and your team have been captured by North Korea and are tasked with finding the nuclear launch platform and disarming the launch cycle before precious time runs out.
